game.name: Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus?
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 반전 매력이 있는 기이한 FMV 살인 미스터리: 누군가 마커스 삼촌을 살해하려 했어요. 연례 가족 퀴즈 행사에서 진실을 밝히고 너무 늦기 전에 삼촌을 구하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An eccentric FMV murder mystery with a twist: someone has poisoned Uncle Marcus. Uncover the truth in the yearly family quiz and try to save him before it is too late.
